description: metal rectangular box bank with printing on two sides; third side has a key with pictures of spiders and webs fourth side has door to coin container; top has plastic skeleton head with a piece of felt covering a skeleton hand
inscription:
Inscription

on skeleton\'s head at side, in turqouise: [YONE (inside a diamond)]; on skeleton\'s head at side, in turquoise: [MADE IN JAPAN PAT (illegible)]
title: "Coffin Bank" mechanical bank
